intervals.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter. Use 10W-30 or 10W-40 motorcycle-specific oil.
Check and adjust intake and exhaust valve clearances using shim-under-bucket system.
Drain and replace engine coolant. Use Honda-approved long-life coolant.
Replace spark plugs. Use NGK IMR9C-9HES or equivalent iridium plugs.
Replace air filter element. Inspect more frequently in dusty conditions.
Check and adjust drive chain slack. Clean and lubricate chain. Replace if stretched beyond limit.
Replace front and rear brake fluid. Use DOT 4 brake fluid.
Inspect front and rear brake pad thickness. Replace when at minimum wear indicator.
Inspect and adjust throttle cable free play. Lubricate cables.
Replace front fork oil. Check fork seals for leaks.
